info.title: Free data API
info.description: Purely for educational purposes API. Nothing here is real-time ;);) Any resemblance to actual markets and real data is purely coincidental. I built this as a hobby, so hopefully, it doesnâ€™t bother anyone. If it ends up causing too much trouble, Iâ€™ll take it down

get.description:
## ðŸ’µ USD MEP Endpoint
- Direct URL   [    ðŸ”—  Open MEP panel in new window ](/live/mep) 

- Endpoint rate limit 120 req/min
- Not real time, endpoints data refreshed every 20 seconds âš¡
- Response data summary:
  - ticker: Stock symbol code
  - bid: Bid price for MEP USD implicit value
  - ask: Ask price for MEP USD implicit value
  - close: Last closing price of MEP USD implicit value
  - mark: Current average bid-ask price of MEP
  - v_ars: Trading volume in ARS 
  - v_usd: Trading volume in USD 
  - q_ars: Quantity of trades in ARS
  - q_usd: Quantity of trades in USD
  - ars_bid: Bid price in ARS for stock
  - ars_ask: Ask price in ARS for stock
  - usd_bid: Bid price in D for stock
  - usd_ask: Ask price in D for stock
  - panel: Panel or market segment where the stock is traded

429.description: Too many requests. Rate limit for this endpoint: 120 req/min

422.description: Validation error. Occurs when the server understands the request but cannot process it due to validation errors in the submitted data

get.description:
## ðŸ’µ USD MEP Endpoint
- Direct URL   [    ðŸ”—  Open MEP panel in new window ](/live/ccl) 

- Endpoint rate limit 120 req/min
- Not real time, endpoints data refreshed every 20 seconds âš¡
- Response data summary:
  - ticker_usa: Stock symbol code in the USA market
  - ticker_ar: Stock symbol code in the Argentine market
  - CCL_bid: Bid price for the CCL implicit value
  - CCL_ask: Ask price for the CCL calculation
  - CCL_close: Last closing price for the CCL
  - CCL_mark: Current average bid-ask price for the CCL
  - ars_volume: Trading volume in Argentine pesos
  - volume_rank: Rank of the stock based on trading volume
  - arg_panel: Market segment or panel for the stock in Argentina
  - usa_panel: Market segment or panel for the stock in the USA

429.description: Too many requests. Rate limit for this endpoint: 120 req/min

422.description: Validation error. Occurs when the server understands the request but cannot process it due to validation errors in the submitted data

get.description:
## ðŸ“ˆ Stocks Endpoint
- Direct URL   [    ðŸ”—  Open STOCKS endpoint in new window ](/live/arg_stocks) 

- Endpoint rate limit 120 req/min
- Not real time, endpoints data refreshed every 20 seconds âš¡
- Response data summary:
  - symbol: Stock symbol code
  - c: Current stock price
  - v: Stock trading volume
  - q_bid: bid quantity
  - px_bid: bid price
  - px_ask: ask price
  - q_ask: ask quantity
  - q_op: daily operations
  - pct_change: daily percent change

get.description:
## ðŸ“ˆ Historical Endpoint
- Direct URL   [   ðŸ”—    Open historical endpoint in new window](/historical/stocks/HAVA) 

- Endpoint rate limit 120 req/min
- **Data Summary:**
  - date: Date
  - o: Open price
  - h: Max price
  - l: Low price
  - c: Close price
  - v: Notional trading volume
  - dr: Daily return
  - sa: Sigma annualized


Possible tickers: ALUA BBAR BMA BYMA CEPU COME CRES CVH EDN GGAL LOMA MIRG PAMP SUPV TECO2 TGNO4 TGSU2 TRAN TXAR VALO YPFD AGRO AUSO BHIP BOLT BPAT CADO CAPX CARC CECO2 CELU CGPA2 CTIO DGCU2 DOME DYCA FERR FIPL GAMI GARO GBAN GCDI GCLA GRIM HARG HAVA HSAT INTR INVJ IRSA LEDE LONG METR MOLA MOLI MORI MTR OEST PATA POLL RICH RIGO ROSE SAMI SEMI

get.description:
## ðŸ“ˆ Volatilities Endpoint
- Direct URL   [    ðŸ”—  Open VOLATILITIES endpoint in new window ](/eod/volatilities/YPF) 

- Endpoint rate limit 120 req/min
- Response data summary:
  - iv_s_term: Short-term implied volatility
  - iv_m_term: Medium-term implied volatility
  - iv_l_term: Long-term implied volatility
  - iv_s_term_percentile: Short-term implied volatility percentile
  - iv_m_term_percentile: Medium-term implied volatility percentile
  - iv_l_term_percentile: Long-term implied volatility percentile
  - hv_s_term: Short-term historical volatility
  - hv_m_term: Medium-term historical volatility
  - hv_l_term: Long-term historical volatility
  - hv_s_term_percentile: Short-term historical volatility percentile
  - hv_m_term_percentile: Medium-term historical volatility percentile
  - hv_l_term_percentile: Long-term historical volatility percentile
  - iv_hv_s_ratio: Short-term implied/historical volatility ratio
  - iv_hv_s_ratio_percentile: Percentile of short-term IV/HV ratio
  - iv_hv_m_ratio: Medium-term implied/historical volatility ratio
  - iv_hv_m_ratio_percentile: Percentile of medium-term IV/HV ratio
  - iv_hv_l_ratio: Long-term implied/historical volatility ratio
  - iv_hv_l_ratio_percentile: Percentile of long-term IV/HV ratio
  - fair_iv: Fair implied volatility  (beta, experimental)
  - fair_iv_percentile: Fair implied volatility percentile  (beta, experimental)
  - iv_fair_iv_ratio: Ratio of implied volatility to fair implied volatility  (beta, experimental)
  - iv_fair_iv_ratio_percentile: Percentile of IV/fair IV ratio  (beta, experimental)

429.description: Too many requests. Rate limit for this endpoint: 120 req/min

422.description: Validation error. Occurs when the server understands the request but cannot process it due to validation errors in the submitted data

get.description:
## ðŸ“ˆ Option_chain Endpoint
- Direct URL   [    ðŸ”—  Open OPTION_CHAIN endpoint in new window ](/eod/option_chain/GGAL) 

- Endpoint rate limit 120 req/min
- Data refreshed once per day, END OF DAY data. Covered: 5000+ underlying stocks
- Response data summary:
  - opex: Expiration date
  - s_symbol: Underlying stock symbol
  - type: Type (call/put)
  - k: Strike price
  - oi: Open interest
  - c: Close price
  - iv: Implied volatility
  - ask: Ask price
  - bid: Bid price
  - delta: Sensitivity to price changes
  - gamma: Rate of change of delta
  - rho: Sensitivity to interest rate changes
  - theta: Time decay of the option
  - vega: Sensitivity to volatility changes
  - fair_value: Theoretical fair value (beta, experimental)
  - itm_prob: Probability of being in-the-money
  - otm: Out-of-the-money value
  - intrinsic: Intrinsic value
  - fair_iv: Fair implied volatility (beta, experimental)
  - r_days: Remaining days until expiration
  - r_tdays: Remaining trading days until expiration
  - hv_2m: 2-month historical volatility
  - hv_1yr: 1-year historical volatility

429.description: Too many requests. Rate limit for this endpoint: 120 req/min

422.description: Validation error. Occurs when the server understands the request but cannot process it due to validation errors in the submitted data

post.description: You can hit up the Milton Casco Data Center Inc, the proud owner of the source code collecting all this data. Ask them to hook you up with repo access so you can spin it up on your own serversâ€”or just drop by to say hi or pitch some wild ideas for new endpoints!

429.description: Too many requests. Rate limit for this endpoint: 1 req/min

422.description: Validation error. Occurs when the server understands the request but cannot process it due to validation errors in the submitted data
